content: cresting waves washcloth by joanna of goddess crochet materials worsted weight 4 cotton yarn 200g knitpicks dishie 2 balls makes 2 dishcloths and one oversized cloth 4 mm hook abbreviations chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet hk - hook repeat - repeat single_crochet - single_crochet skip - skip sl - slip st - stitch w/ - with pattern multiples of 3 plus 2 regular measures 8 by 8 20cm x 20cm 1 chain 32 single_crochet in back bump of 2nd chain from hk and each chain across turn 31 single_crochet 2 chain 1 single_crochet 2dc in first single_crochet skip 2 single_crochet * single_crochet 2dc in next single_crochet skip 2 single_crochet repeat from * until 1 single_crochet remains single_crochet in last single_crochet turn 3 chain 1 single_crochet 2dc in first single_crochet skip 2 double_crochet * single_crochet 2dc in next single_crochet skip 2 double_crochet repeat from * until 1 single_crochet remains single_crochet in last single_crochet turn 4 - 23 repeat 3 24 chain 1 single_crochet in each st across turn 25 chain 1 3 single_crochet in first st single_crochet in each st across 3 single_crochet in corner single_crochet evenly across 3 single_crochet in corner single_crochet in each st across 3 single_crochet in corner single_crochet evenly across join to first single_crochet w/ slip_stitch 26 slip_stitch in each st around join to first st w/ slip_stitch fasten_off weave in ends striped variation use contrast color for row 4 and 5 and 20 and 21 oversized measures 10 x 10 25cm x 25cm 1 chain 44 single_crochet in back bump of 2nd chain from hk and each chain across turn 43 single_crochet 2 chain 1 single_crochet 2dc in first single_crochet skip 2 single_crochet * single_crochet 2dc in next single_crochet skip 2 single_crochet repeat until 1 single_crochet remains single_crochet in last single_crochet turn 3 chain 1 single_crochet 2dc in first single_crochet skip 2 double_crochet * single_crochet 2dc in next single_crochet skip 2 double_crochet repeat from * until 1 single_crochet remains single_crochet in last single_crochet turn 4 - 32 repeat 3 33 chain 1 single_crochet in each st across turn 34 chain 1 3 single_crochet in first st single_crochet in each st across 3 single_crochet in corner single_crochet evenly across 3 single_crochet in corner single_crochet in each st across 3 single_crochet in corner single_crochet evenly across join to first single_crochet w/ slip_stitch 35 slip_stitch in each st around join to first st w/ slip_stitch fasten_off weave in ends striped variation use contrast color on row 6 and 7 and 27 and 28 disclaimer feel free to sell your dishcloths but please use your own photos and do not sell the pattern http //www goddesscrochet com http //www ravelry com/designers/goddess-crochet https //instagram com/goddesscrochet/ https //www youtube com/channel/ucor2gkj4yo2jgcv5mszbtma if you need to stock up on dishie cotton feel free to use my affiliate link i receive small commission at no cost to you which allows me to continue creating patterns thank you https //shrsl com/4nlsa
